title: Imagine a World Beyond Jobs
excerpt: Is a future without jobs possible? As AI advances, our idea of work is changing fast. Instead of fearing job loss, what if we see it as a chance for a new beginning? Explore how technology might reshape our world, challenging the very idea of work as we know it.
